title: 1  数据类型和数据结构
text:
1.1 数据类型
数据类型（mode）：表示对象在计算机内存中的存储形式
crumbs: 1  数据类型和数据结构

title: 1  数据类型和数据结构
text:
1.1.1 numeric – 数值型（integer/double）
integer – 整型 L

Codemode(4.3)
#> [1] "numeric"
class(4.3)
#> [1] "numeric"
mode(1L)
#> [1] "numeric"
class(1L)
#> [1] "integer"



1.1.2 character – 字符型

Codemode(c("car"))
#> [1] "character"
class("car")
#> [1] "character"



1.1.3 logical – 逻辑型

Codemode(c(TRUE,FALSE))
#> [1] "logical"
class(c(TRUE,FALSE))
#> [1] "logical"



1.1.4 complex – 复数型

Code
mode(c(1+2i,3-4i)) 
#> [1] "complex"
class(c(1+2i,3-4i))
#> [1] "complex"



1.1.5 raw型

CodecharToRaw("abcde12345") #字符串中每个字符的原始存储格式（十六进制？）
#>  [1] 61 62 63 64 65 31 32 33 34 35
mode(charToRaw("abcde12345")) 
#> [1] "raw"
class(charToRaw("abcde12345"))
#> [1] "raw"
crumbs: 1  数据类型和数据结构

title: 1  数据类型和数据结构
text:
1.2 数据结构
class：是一种基于面向对象的R的抽象类型划分,或者理解为一种数据结构。

1.2.1 vector
向量,同一类元素的集合。 ?c      #Combine Values into a Vector or List
R中没有标量（scalar），只含一个元素的向量

Code#单元素向量
1 == c(1)
#> [1] TRUE
is.vector(1)
#> [1] TRUE
  
"a"
#> [1] "a"
is.vector("a")
#> [1] TRUE

#使用函数c()创建向量

c(1)
#> [1] 1
c(1,2,3,4,5)
#> [1] 1 2 3 4 5
c("a","b","c")
#> [1] "a" "b" "c"



1.2.2 factor
因子，分类变量，其中每个级别都是一类。?factor factor(vector,ordered=FALSE,levels=c(v1,v2,…),labels= ,...) ，在内存中以整数向量c(1,2,3,...,k)存储。

Code# 存储形式
class(factor((c(1,2,3)))) 
#> [1] "factor"
mode(factor((c(1,2,3)))) 
#> [1] "numeric"

# 名义变量 nominal variable
diabetes<-c("t1","t2","t1","t1") 
str(diabetes)
#>  chr [1:4] "t1" "t2" "t1" "t1"
diabetes<-factor(diabetes)
str(diabetes)
#>  Factor w/ 2 levels "t1","t2": 1 2 1 1

# 顺序变量 ordinal variable     默认水平根据字母顺序而定
status<-c("poor","better","best","poor")
status<-factor(status,ordered = TRUE) 
str(status) 
#>  Ord.factor w/ 3 levels "best"<"better"<..: 3 2 1 3
status<-factor(status,ordered =TRUE,levels = c("poor","better","best")) 
str(status) 
#>  Ord.factor w/ 3 levels "poor"<"better"<..: 1 2 3 1


#改变外在标签
sex<-c(1,2,2,1)
sex
#> [1] 1 2 2 1
sex<-factor(sex,levels=c(1,2),labels = c("男","女")) 
str(sex) 
#>  Factor w/ 2 levels "男","女": 1 2 2 1
sex
#> [1] 男 女 女 男
#> Levels: 男 女

leadership <- read_csv("data/leadership.txt") |> column_to_rownames(var = "id")
# 连续型变量→因子
leadership$agecat<-cut(leadership$age,
                    breaks = c(0,18,45,65,Inf),
                    labels=c("minor","young","middle_age","elder"),
                    include.lowest = TRUE,
                    right = TRUE
                    )
leadership$agecat
#> [1] young young young elder elder
#> Levels: minor young middle_age elder



1.2.3 date/datetime
日期/日期时间 默认格式："%Y-%m-%d" xxxx-xx-xx,例如：2023-03-15

Codemode(as.Date("2023-12-11"))
#> [1] "numeric"
class(as.Date("2023-12-11")) 
#> [1] "Date"

date()
#> [1] "Mon Apr 15 19:14:46 2024"
Sys.Date()
#> [1] "2024-04-15"
as.Date(c("02 14-2002","01 04-2013"),"%m %d-%Y") #以"%m %d-%Y"格式读入
#> [1] "2002-02-14" "2013-01-04"
format(Sys.Date(),"%Y/%m/%d") #以"%Y/%m/%d"格式输出
#> [1] "2024/04/15"

leadership<-read_csv("data/leadership.txt")
leadership

1.2.4 matrix
矩阵，所有元素必须是同一类型。?matrix
matrix(data= ,nrow=1  ,ncol=1  ,byrow=FALSE ,dimnames=list(rnames,cnames) ,...)

Codenum<-c(16,22,24,28)
rnames<-c("R1","R2")
cnames<-c("C1","C2")
mymatrix<-matrix(num,nrow=2,ncol=2,byrow=TRUE,dimnames=list(rnames,cnames))
mymatrix   
#>    C1 C2
#> R1 16 22
#> R2 24 28



1.2.5 array
数组，所有元素必须是同一类型。?array
array(data,dim_numeric_vector=c(...),dimnames = list(dim1,dim2,...),...)

Codev<-1:24 
dim1<-c("A1","A2","A3") 
dim2<-c("B1","B2","B3","B4")
dim3<-c("C1","C2") 
myarray<-array(v,c(3,4,2),dimnames = list(dim1,dim2,dim3)) 
myarray
#> , , C1
#> 
#>    B1 B2 B3 B4
#> A1  1  4  7 10
#> A2  2  5  8 11
#> A3  3  6  9 12
#> 
#> , , C2
#> 
#>    B1 B2 B3 B4
#> A1 13 16 19 22
#> A2 14 17 20 23
#> A3 15 18 21 24



1.2.6 data frame/tibble
数据框， 由列向量组成，每一列元素必须是同一类型，列与列之间长度必须相同，但类型可以不同。?data.frame
data.frame(name1=col_vector1,name2=col_vector2,...,row.names = ,...) ?tibble，tibble()是tidyverse风格的数据框，用法类似。

Codeid<-c(1,2,3,4) 
age<-c(21,14,52,15) 
diabetes<-c("t1","t2","t1","t1") 
status<-c("poor","better","best","poor") 
patient<-data.frame(patientID=id,age,diabetes,status,row.names = id) # 4个列向量组成数据框 
patient |> rownames_to_column(var = "ID")

1.2.7 list
列表，由以上各种数据结构组成?list list(name1=object1,name2=object2,...)

Codemylist<-list(title="My list",
             matr=matrix(c("a1","b1","a2","b2"),nrow=2,ncol=2,byrow=TRUE,
                           dimnames = list(c("X1","X2"),c("Y1","Y2"))
                         ),
             df=data.frame(id=matrix(c("Lisa","BOb","John","Jule"),
                                     nrow=4,ncol=1,byrow=TRUE
                                     ),
                           int=c(3,5,7,9),
                           TF=c(T,T,T,F)
                           ),
             list=list(a=c(1,2,3),b=c("A","B"))
             )
mylist
#> $title
#> [1] "My list"
#> 
#> $matr
#>    Y1   Y2  
#> X1 "a1" "b1"
#> X2 "a2" "b2"
#> 
#> $df
#>     id int    TF
#> 1 Lisa   3  TRUE
#> 2  BOb   5  TRUE
#> 3 John   7  TRUE
#> 4 Jule   9 FALSE
#> 
#> $list
#> $list$a
#> [1] 1 2 3
#> 
#> $list$b
#> [1] "A" "B"
mode(mylist)
#> [1] "list"
class(mylist)
#> [1] "list"



1.2.8 function

Codemode(c)
#> [1] "function"
class(c)
#> [1] "function"

mode(sum)
#> [1] "function"
class(sum)
#> [1] "function"

title: 3  基本数据处理
text:
3.1 basic data processing
Codex <- 1
ls()
#> [1] "x"
rm(x)#删除某个对象
.num<-c(1,2,3,4,5)  #以.开头的是隐藏对象  
ls()
#> character(0)
rm(list=ls())#删除几乎所有对象,以.开头的隐藏对象不受影响
.num
#> [1] 1 2 3 4 5

#>  [8] 23.555556 26.777778 30.000000

rep(x = c("A",1,"B",2),times = 3)           #重复序列
#>  [1] "A" "1" "B" "2" "A" "1" "B" "2" "A" "1" "B" "2"

#>  [1] "A" "1" "1" "B" "B" "B" "2" "2" "2" "2"
rep(x = c("A",1,"B",2),each = 3,times = 2)
#>  [1] "A" "A" "A" "1" "1" "1" "B" "B" "B" "2" "2" "2" "A" "A" "A" "1" "1" "1" "B"
#> [20] "B" "B" "2" "2" "2"

x <- c(2.3,4.5,2.4,3,3.8,4,5.6,6.7,2.1,1.5)
cut( x = x, breaks =3,)                # 因子

#> Levels: (1.49,3.23] (3.23,4.97] (4.97,6.71]
cut( x = x, breaks =c(1,3,5,8),include.lowest = TRUE) 
#>  [1] [1,3] (3,5] [1,3] [1,3] (3,5] (3,5] (5,8] (5,8] [1,3] [1,3]

3.1.6 数学函数

Codex<-c(25,-4,3.66,3.42,-5.99)
abs(x)                       #绝对值
#> [1] 25.00  4.00  3.66  3.42  5.99
sqrt(x)                      #平方根
#> [1] 5.000000      NaN 1.913113 1.849324      NaN
ceiling(x)                   #向上取整
#> [1] 25 -4  4  4 -5
floor(x)                     #向下取整
#> [1] 25 -4  3  3 -6
trunc(x)                     #整数部分
#> [1] 25 -4  3  3 -5
round(x,digits = 2)          #四舍五入，保留2位小数
#> [1] 25.00 -4.00  3.66  3.42 -5.99
signif(x,digits = 2)         #四舍五入，保留2有效数字
#> [1] 25.0 -4.0  3.7  3.4 -6.0
log(x,base=4)                #对x取以base为底的对数
#> [1] 2.3219281       NaN 0.9359218 0.8869982       NaN
log(x)                          #自然对数
#> [1] 3.218876      NaN 1.297463 1.229641      NaN
log10(x)                        #常用对数
#> [1] 1.3979400       NaN 0.5634811 0.5340261       NaN
exp(x)                       #e指数函数
#> [1] 7.200490e+10 1.831564e-02 3.886134e+01 3.056942e+01 2.503664e-03



3.1.7 统计函数

Codemean(x,trim = 0.05,na.rm = TRUE)     #算术平均值
#> [1] 4.418
median(x)                            #中位数
#> [1] 3.42
sd(x)                                #标准差
#> [1] 12.29206
var(x)                               #方差
#> [1] 151.0946
mad(x)                               #绝对中位差
#> [1] 11.00089
quantile(x,probs = c(0,0.25,0.5,0.75,1))     #分位数
#>    0%   25%   50%   75%  100% 
#> -5.99 -4.00  3.42  3.66 25.00
range(x)                             # 值域
#> [1] -5.99 25.00
scale(x,center = TRUE,scale = TRUE)  #标准化（均值为0、标准差为1）
#>             [,1]
#> [1,]  1.67441487

#> [3,] -0.06166585
#> [4,] -0.08119065
#> [5,] -0.84672578
#> attr(,"scaled:center")
#> [1] 4.418
#> attr(,"scaled:scale")
#> [1] 12.29206
scale(x,center = TRUE,scale =FALSE)  #中心化：减去均值
#>         [,1]
#> [1,]  20.582
#> [2,]  -8.418
#> [3,]  -0.758
#> [4,]  -0.998
#> [5,] -10.408

#> [1] 4.418


x <- c(1,3,5,7,9,11,13)
# Find the "previous" (lag()) or "next" (lead()) values in a vector
dplyr::lag(x,n=2)                      # n阶滞后
#> [1] NA NA  1  3  5  7  9
dplyr::lead(x,n=2)                     # n阶前移
#> [1]  5  7  9 11 13 NA NA

# 滞后差分  lag阶滞后  difference阶差分
diff(x,lag = 1,difference=1)     # 隔0个值后位减前位，进行1次
#> [1] 2 2 2 2 2 2
diff(x,lag = 1,difference=2)     ## 隔0个值后位减前位，进行2次
#> [1] 0 0 0 0 0
diff(x,lag = 1,difference=3)     # 隔0个值后位减前位，进行3次
#> [1] 0 0 0 0

diff(x,lag = 2,difference=1)  # 隔1个值后位减前位，进行1次
#> [1] 4 4 4 4 4
diff(x,lag = 2,difference=2) ## 隔1个值后位减前位，进行2次
#> [1] 0 0 0

3.1.9.4 lapply(), sapply()

lapply() returns a list of the same length as X,
sapply() is a user-friendly version and wrapper of lapply() by default returning a vector or matrix

Codex <- list(a = 1:10, beta = exp(-3:3), logic = c(TRUE,FALSE,FALSE,TRUE))
lapply(X = x,FUN = quantile)
#> $a
#>    0%   25%   50%   75%  100% 
#>  1.00  3.25  5.50  7.75 10.00 
#> 
#> $beta
#>          0%         25%         50%         75%        100% 
#>  0.04978707  0.25160736  1.00000000  5.05366896 20.08553692 
#> 
#> $logic
#>   0%  25%  50%  75% 100% 
#>  0.0  0.0  0.5  1.0  1.0

sapply(x, quantile)
#>          a        beta logic
#> 0%    1.00  0.04978707   0.0
#> 25%   3.25  0.25160736   0.0
#> 50%   5.50  1.00000000   0.5
#> 75%   7.75  5.05366896   1.0
#> 100% 10.00 20.08553692   1.0


mapply for applying a function to multiple arguments,
rapply for a recursive version of lapply()
eapply for applying a function to each entry in an environment.

3.1.14 概率函数
形如[dpqr]distribution_abbreviation，其中密度函数d，分布函数p，分位数函数q，随机数生成函数r

Code### 正态分布
dnorm(3,0,2)  #N(0,4)在 3 处的密度值
#> [1] 0.0647588
pnorm(1:3,0,2)#N(0,4)在1，2，3处的分布概率值
#> [1] 0.6914625 0.8413447 0.9331928
qnorm(1-0.025,0,1)# N(0,1)的上0.025分位数
#> [1] 1.959964
rnorm(5,3,3)  # 生成5个服从N(3,9)的随机数
#> [1] -1.636214  5.653800  1.694336  8.481734  2.588534


### 二项分布
1-sum(dbinom(0:1,400,0.02))# 命中率为0.02，独立射击400次，至少击中2次的概率
#> [1] 0.9971655

3.1.14.1 正态分布

Codenorm <- function(xlim = c(-Inf,+Inf)){
  ggplot() + xlim(xlim) +
    geom_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = 0, sd = 1), color="red")+
        scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,1))+
    geom_function(fun = pnorm,color="blue")
}
norm(c(-5,5))








3.1.14.2 二项分布

Codebinom <- function(n,p){
    ggplot() +
        geom_line(data.frame(x = 0:n, 
                      y = dbinom(0:n, size = n, prob = p)), 
           mapping=aes(x = x, y = y),
           color="red")+
        geom_line(data.frame(x = 0:n, 
                      y = pbinom(0:n, size = n, prob = p)), 
           mapping=aes(x = x, y = y),
           color="blue")
}

binom(10,0.5)
